004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command;
006
007/**
008 * This command will execute once, then finish immediately afterward.
009 *
010 * <p>Subclassing {@link InstantCommand} is shorthand for returning true from {@link Command
011 * isFinished}.
012 *
013 * <p>This class is provided by the OldCommands VendorDep
014 */
015public class InstantCommand extends Command {
016  private Runnable m_func;
017
018  public InstantCommand() {}
019
020  /**
021   * Creates a new {@link InstantCommand InstantCommand} with the given name.
022   *
023   * @param name the name for this command
024   */
025  public InstantCommand(String name) {
026    super(name);
027  }
028
029  /**
030   * Creates a new {@link InstantCommand InstantCommand} with the given requirement.
031   *
032   * @param subsystem the subsystem this command requires
033   */
034  public InstantCommand(Subsystem subsystem) {
035    super(subsystem);
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Creates a new {@link InstantCommand InstantCommand} with the given name and requirement.
040   *
041   * @param name the name for this command
042   * @param subsystem the subsystem this command requires
043   */
044  public InstantCommand(String name, Subsystem subsystem) {
045    super(name, subsystem);
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Creates a new {@link InstantCommand InstantCommand}.
050   *
051   * @param func the function to run when {@link Command#initialize() initialize()} is run
052   */
053  public InstantCommand(Runnable func) {
054    m_func = func;
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Creates a new {@link InstantCommand InstantCommand}.
059   *
060   * @param name the name for this command
061   * @param func the function to run when {@link Command#initialize() initialize()} is run
062   */
063  public InstantCommand(String name, Runnable func) {
064    super(name);
065    m_func = func;
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Creates a new {@link InstantCommand InstantCommand}.
070   *
071   * @param requirement the subsystem this command requires
072   * @param func the function to run when {@link Command#initialize() initialize()} is run
073   */
074  public InstantCommand(Subsystem requirement, Runnable func) {
075    super(requirement);
076    m_func = func;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Creates a new {@link InstantCommand InstantCommand}.
081   *
082   * @param name the name for this command
083   * @param requirement the subsystem this command requires
084   * @param func the function to run when {@link Command#initialize() initialize()} is run
085   */
086  public InstantCommand(String name, Subsystem requirement, Runnable func) {
087    super(name, requirement);
088    m_func = func;
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  protected boolean isFinished() {
093    return true;
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Trigger the stored function.
098   *
099   * <p>Called just before this Command runs the first time.
100   */
101  @Override
102  protected void _initialize() {
103    super._initialize();
104    if (m_func != null) {
105      m_func.run();
106    }
107  }
108}
